model_answers.description: Path to raw txt file containing model generation

parsed_answers_json.description: Path to parsed json file containing parsed model answers

hit_annotation_json.description: Path to json file containing HITs with annotations (which answers that the true answer could be found in)

sem_scores_json.description: Path to json file containing semantic similarity scores annotation for the model answers / true answers

sem_scores_analysis_sheet.description: Path to xlsx file containing mean and virance and other statistics on the similarity scores across different cateogories

sem_scores_stacked_bars_plot.description: Path to png file containing stacked bars plot of the similarity scores across different cateogories

sem_scores_interactive_plot.description: Path to html file containing interactive plot of the similarity scores across different cateogories

test_data_extended.description: Path to json file containing test data with extended language

processed_test_data.description: Path to json file containing processed test data
